title.narrative: Equal Pay International Coalition On-line Platform

description.narrative: Following consultations with members of the Equal Pay International Coalition (EPIC) – A coalition led by ILO, UN Women, and the OECD. UN Women is contributing with funds for the development of a knowledge-sharing platform along with additional alterations to optimize the sharing of resources from the EPIC website. This online page will be developed by the external agency E-Zest, in cooperation with the ILO and with input from members of EPIC. The purpose of this activity is to optimize specialized resources on the website of EPIC for improved programmatic work.
